goal.en: “Finite element method (FEM) is a well-established numerical method for modeling continuum media. FEM is extensively used in both scientific and industrial applications. This course presents the theoretical background of FEM. The contents include displacement method, variational formulation, iso-parametric formulation, and derivation of stiffness matrix for various elements (e.g., truss element, beam element, frame element, plane element, and axisymmetric element).“
goal.ch: “大部分的工程問題皆無法求得解析解，最常應用的近似解法為有限元素法，有限元素法其理論架構完整與嚴謹，而且廣泛應用在各個領域，為學習分析與設計之必修課程。課程內容包含能量分析法，力學基礎理論，內插函數，常用元素公式，相關數值方法，建模求解，結果解讀等。預期學生將獲得下列能力︰ 1. 有限元素法基礎理論。 2. 建立工程問題之有限元素模型。 3. 相關數值方法之解題流程及程式設計。 4. 分析結果之解讀及應用。“

content.en:
“(1) Introduction to FEM
(2) Introduction to the stiffness method(displacement method)
(3) Development of truss equations
(4) Development of beam equations
(5) Frame and grid equations
(6) Development of the plane stress and plane strain stiffness equations
(7) Derivation of the linear-strain triangular equations
(8) Axi-symmetric elements
(9) Isoparametric formulation
(10) Numerical integration and modelling consideration
(11) Three-dimensional stress analysis
(12) Structural dynamics“
content.ch:
“(1) Introduction to FEM
(2) Introduction to the stiffness method(displacement method)
(3) Development of truss equations
(4) Development of beam equations
(5) Frame and grid equations
(6) Development of the plane stress and plane strain stiffness equations
(7) Derivation of the linear-strain triangular equations
(8) Axi-symmetric elements
(9) Isoparametric formulation
(10) Numerical integration and modelling consideration
(11) Three-dimensional stress analysis
(12) Structural dynamics“

textbook.en: “A First Course in the Finite Element Method 5th SI Edition, by D.L. Logan, Cengage Learning Engineering, 2012.“
textbook.ch: “A First Course in the Finite Element Method 5th SI Edition, by D.L. Logan, Cengage Learning Engineering, 2012.“

grading.en: “(1) Attendance: 10％ (2) Homework: 30％ (3) Midterm Exam.: 30％ (4) Final Exam.: 30％“
grading.ch: “(1) Attendance: 10％ (2) Homework: 30％ (3) Midterm Exam.: 30％ (4) Final Exam.: 30％“

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
